tool_description: The Initial Coin Offering API provides information on upcoming, past and present token presales. It allows you to sort by filters, trends, profile tickers and more.
name: ICOs
title: ICOs

api_list.name: ICOs - All
api_list.description: Returns some basic information about the all ICOs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-icos-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/icos/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-icos-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ICO - Profile
api_list.description: Returns returns detailed information of the ICO.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-icos-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/icos/Profile?name=DocTailor"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-icos-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
